meta_description: Naples Art Institute enlightens, engages, educates, and enriches the community of Naples, Florida through art exhibitions, art classes, kids' programs, and more.
hours_text:
## Generations of Art

Planned giving supports Naples Art Institute now and for future generations.

* * *

### Give the ultimate gift.

Have you ever imagined the joy of seeing your child, grandchild, or even great-grandchild learning the art of watercolor in the very same studio where you once honed your skills? For three generations, Naples Art Institute has been a place of encouragement and inspiration for aspiring artists, and we're committed to continuing this mission for generations to come.

If you share our passion for fostering creativity and want to help secure our future, we invite you to consider leaving a planned gift to Naples Art Institute in your will or trust. By including the simple wording "to Naples Art Institute," you can make a lasting impact on our vital priorities, including programming, operational support, and endowment.

Your support will help us continue to provide a vibrant and nurturing artistic community for generations to come, and we're grateful for any contribution you can make. Thank you for considering Naples Art Institute in your planned giving.

To learn more about creating your legacy, contact Frank Verpoorten at [frank.verpoorten@naplesart.org](mailto:frank.verpoorten@naplesart.org) or call [239.262.6517](tel:239-262-6517).

[ Preserve Your Legacy ](mailto:frank.verpoorten@naplesart.org)

* * *

admission_text:
## Join Our Inner Circle

Become a member of Naples Art Institute!

Membership at Naples Art Institute comes with a variety of benefits that grow with each tier. Depending on the level you choose, you’ll enjoy perks such as free admission to exhibitions, discounts on purchases at the Gift Shop, reduced rates on education classes, North American Reciprocal Museum (NARM) membership, priority ticketing for select special events, and invitations to members-only events and programs throughout the year.

Your membership not only connects you to the Naples Art Institute’s vibrant community, it also helps support exhibitions, classes, and cultural programming that keep our organization thriving. Explore the membership levels below to find the one that’s right for you.

* * *

### **Membership Levels**

  * ####  Student | $25 

Must register in person to show valid student I.D.

Free admission to exhibitions

Invitations to members-only events

10% discount at Naples Art Institute Gift Shop

Access to open studio opportunities (subject to availability)

JOIN BY VISITING US

  * ####  Individual | $100 

Free admission to exhibitions

Invitations to members-only events

10% discount at Naples Art Institute Gift Shop

Access to open studio opportunities (subject to availability)

[JOIN TODAY](/individual-membership)

  * ####  Family | $150 

Free admission to exhibitions

Invitations to members-only events

10% discount at Naples Art Institute Gift Shop
